title: Mutant Vocalizations
description: A collection of alien creature vocalizations, contains 220 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/mutant-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ix4dw94qqt2uxjl/MSE%20-%20Mutant%20Vocalizations_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A Mutant is a medium-sized alien creature that resembles an orc or an ogre. This soldier has good strength and agility and is protected by armor. There is something animalistic and unrealistic in his voice.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 16 voice actions, including 220 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 20 voice sounds during an attack
  • 16 battle shouts
  • 8 coughs
  • 20 deaths
  • 8 exert and effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 28 growls
  • 8 idle sounds
  • 8 jumps and actions
  • 8 laughs
  • 20 pains
  • 28 roars
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 8 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 8 sounds of tiredness
  • 16 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.


This package is ideal for creating small and medium-sized monster voices: alien, mutant, humanoid, parasite, critter, demon, infernal and undead creatures and more.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 220 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 16 voice actions
  • 116 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 56 voice samples of the pain type
  • 48 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 220

Number of Audio Cues: 220

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 06 minutes 55 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
